Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.filters.TextMarkerFilter

  • Packages that use TextMarkerFilter 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.filters
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.

    • Uses of TextMarkerFilter in com.joliciel.talismane

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane that return types with arguments of type TextMarkerFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TextMarkerFilter> TalismaneConfig.getTextMarkerFilters()
      Text marker filters are applied to raw text segments extracted from the stream, 3 segments at a time.

    • Uses of TextMarkerFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.filters

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.filters that return TextMarkerFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getDuplicateWhiteSpaceFilter()
      Gets rid of duplicate whitespace.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getNewlineEndOfSentenceMarker()
      Replace any newline with a sentence break.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getNewlineSpaceMarker()
      Replace any newline with a space.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getOtherWhiteSpaceFilter()
      Replaces any whitespace characters (including tabs) by a standard whitespace.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getRegexMarkerFilter(List<MarkerFilterType> types, String regex, int blockSize)
      For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getRegexMarkerFilter(List<MarkerFilterType> types, String regex, int groupIndex, int blockSize)
      For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getRegexMarkerFilter(MarkerFilterType[] types, String regex, int blockSize) 
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getRegexMarkerFilter(MarkerFilterType[] types, String regex, int groupIndex, int blockSize) 
      TextMarkerFilter TextMarker.getSource()
      The filter which generated this text marker.
      TextMarkerFilter FilterService.getTextMarkerFilter(String descriptor, int blockSize)
